name: Emergency Dodge
description: A desperate last-moment evasive maneuver. Can be executed very late but costs high stamina and leaves you vulnerable.

windUp.description: Explosive reaction, throwing body out of harm's way

recovery.description: Long recovery as defender struggles to regain footing and guard from awkward position

stamina.description: High stamina cost due to explosive movement and long recovery

defensiveProperties.description: Reduces damage by 50% but doesn't completely negate it. Can be executed just before or at Impact tick.

effectiveWindow.description: Can be initiated very late - up to 200ms before Impact, even at Impact tick itself

onSuccess.description: Reduces incoming damage but long recovery (1200ms) leaves defender vulnerable to follow-up

onFailure.description: If mistimed completely, takes full damage AND suffers long recovery

specialProperties.description: Can be used as a last resort when other defenses aren't ready. Can interrupt your own wind-up phase to execute emergency dodge.

metadata.notes: Panic button for when you misread telegraphs or realize too late. Keeps you alive but at great cost. Long recovery makes you vulnerable to follow-up attacks. Use sparingly.
